title: A couple very nice t210-7s available - Beatty and Whelan...prices lowered on 7/19!

posts.post_title: A couple very nice t210-7s available - Beatty and Whelan...prices lowered on 7/19!
posts.post_content:
Have a couple extras, thought I'd see if anyone else could use them.  Both cards are extremely nice for the issue with only minor corner wear.  No wrinkling/creasing at all!  Asking $195 for the Beatty and $165 for the Whelan.  Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
Bump...lowered prices.  Asking $175 for Beatty and $135 for Whelan
